mapper.select: select a.menuCode,a.showIndex,p.menuName,p.parentCode,p.iconSmall,p.iconLarge,p.menuLink,p.authLink from sys_menu_info a left join plat_menu_info p on a.menuCode=p.menuCode where a.corpCode=#{corpCode} and a.menuCode in ( select b.menuCode from sys_role_menu b left join sys_role_info e on b.corpCode=e.corpCode and b.roleCode=e.roleCode where e.statusCode=1 and b.corpCode= #{corpCode} and b.roleCode in (select c.roleCode from sys_role_user c where c.corpCode= #{corpCode} and c.userCode=#{userCode}) union select d.menuCode from sys_user_menu d where d.corpCode= #{corpCode} and d.userCode= #{userCode} ) and a.statusCode=1 and p.adapFlag != 2 order by a.showIndex
